definitions.definition: A non-specific rule or principle that provides direction to action or behaviour .
examples: He considered the Ten Commandments more as a guideline than a requirement.

definitions.definition: A plan or explanation to guide one in setting standards or determining a course of action .
A light line, used in lettering , to help align the text .

main_definition: A non-specific rule or principle that provides direction to action or behaviour .
secondary_definitions: A plan or explanation to guide one in setting standards or determining a course of action .
A light line, used in lettering , to help align the text .
